label: A2B3_tP40_137_cdf_3g-001
title: Zn$_{3}$P$_{2}$ ($D5_{9}$) Structure
comments:
(Stackelberg, 1935) gives the atomic positions in the first setting of space group $P4_{2}/nmc$ \#137. We have changed this to the second setting, placing the origin of the system at the inversion site. 
 (Pearson, 1958, p. 803) gives the space group as $P4_{2}/mmc$ \#131, but it is correctly given as $P4_{2}/nmc$ on page 111.
